values:
i just wrote a whole one and then closed the window by accident. oh well. i'll type more later. 


i love you jon!

so. i got a new computer for christmas!!!! oh my god i'm so obsessed with it. it's a PowerMac G4 Cube and it's beautiful. i'm on it right now as a matter of fact. my first time! it's used so i'm not totally de-virginizing it but i'd like to think so! i got a new coat from daniella, its army green and its kind of like a bomber with a fur hood. its hot. i got other stuff too.
new years will be cool, we're going to sunday river. and then i need to focus on money. alright well i'm gonna go play with my new beautiful piece of machinery. peace

Far above the clouds
Some children laughed I'd fall for certain
For thinking that I'd last forever
But I knew exactly where I was 

And I knew the meaning of it all
And I knew the distance to the sun
And I knew the echo that is love
And I knew the secrets in your spires
And I knew the emptiness of youth
And I knew the solitude of heart
And I knew the murmurs of the soul
And the world is drawn into your hands
And the world is etched upon your heart
And the world so hard to understand
Is the world you can't live without

And I knew the silence of the world

it's 3 degrees outside. jesus make christmas warmer! please!! i'm all cuddled into my blanket and my heater's right next to me. i'm all done christmas shopping, yay! i can't wait for christmas. we have a tree and it's so cute! it's a fat one. jon helped us put it up yesterday. that was nice. we watched dirty pretty things with Kath and it was a very wierd movie. not what i expected. 

i miss claud and allie and tiff and trevor and tim and amelia. i miss boston and the HEAT THAT WE HAD! i know, i complained about it a lot but now i want it. 


i love you jon
all i have to say is- IT'S 14 DEGREES FERENHEIT HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!! AH!!

so i'm home now, wow.
hehe i rhymed!! i woke up like fifteen minutes ago...ahhhh that was nice. i miss jon! it's wierd getting used to seeing him everyday and then suddenly not being able to. he called a little while ago and asked my shoe size! i love christmas. except i have no money so i once i start working i'll probably love it even more! hehe. well yea. maine. *sigh*

so i'm done. with school that is. tonight is gonna be a PARTY!!!!!!!!!!!!! WOOHOO! when i come back tiff will have taken katie's spot which is exciting, a big change. so now i'm waiting for my laundry and then i'm going to cambridge with claud and jon. i got a job!!!!!!!!!! at o'nats but its still a job! and i get to be a cashier instead of an assembler which is much better, i get to deal with the moolah! hehe. well, i go home on sunday which is great. i gotta enjoy it though while i'm still down here in bostonia, peace out!

So, so long sweet summer
I stumbled upon you and gratefully basked in your rays
So long sweet summer
I fell into you
Now you're gracefully falling away

 

winter is officially here and it's going to make me crazy. right now i'm writing an art history paper on the Inca. it's much worse than it sounds. trust me. my first paper my teacher said that it was poorly written and unclearly organized and problematic. so i'm trying really hard. but it's frustrating. last night was wierd, i'm trying to forget how i felt. i woke up at 4pm. i'm all fucked up. but

 

sometimes it's ok

wow, i haven't written in a while. sorry. i guess i'm busy trying to finish up things. and it's so helpful that i have created new ideas today because i have SO MUCH time to work on them! jeez! perfect timing ceri. oh well, maybe i can squeeze some stuff in before my review board which is next wednesday. then my final english paper is due friday morning and then i'm done!!! woo hoo! this has gone by so fast. i really hope that all my classes are good next semester. I really want to take a photo class, like a foundation one, but i'm not even on the wait list or anything so who knows. anyways. i should be working on my english paper. bye.

scary news after scary news. i'm home. the lighting is beautiful in here, non-flourescent and calm. my sisters are here, my dog, my parents. i didn't get to see jon tonight, that would have made it perfect. it's raining though. part of me wants to be back in boston but then i feel guilty. i mean it's thanksgiving. and i've missed my family so much. i slept 14 hours last night. i feel so much better. except it's only 10pm and i'm tired. i think i'm going to go watch tv with my sisters. 'night

hi,

i'm in jon's room waiting for him and chris to go get mike cause he's lost. tonight we're going to the planetarium at the science museum to watch the radiohead light show. that should be pretty cool, skeets and his friend matt will be there too. i've been to a light show in a planetarium before in NY and it was kind of boring, but hopefully this will be cool, its only six bucks too.

last night we went to a northeastern party ( i think). that was fun, and skeets friends craig and frances are really nice and chill. i slept a lot today, *coo*. but yea, so now i'm just chillin', my stomach hurts a little bit but i think i'm alright. well i guess that's it. blah.

I got Mieke's package today in the mail! ( no, not dirtyness ) hehe. It had 2 mr. goodbars, 2 pieces of koolers gum and 2 CDS. I listened to the CDs while I was relaxing after lunch and I was on the verge of tears the whole time! All of the songs are so sad and beautiful and make me think of home and being with my friends from home and all of that. It was so amazing mieke, thank you. 

I finished my will barnet: dawn painting today in class, it's cool. It's not exact but hey, I tried. Ellie: if you want to see it you should come visit and I can show you my school and the painting! That would be fun, and we could go out to eat. Oh shit, I forgot my laundry is done! oops! sorry to interrupt this! I love you all!

"What I've always known. It's what I've always wanted. It's God. That's what it is. All of this. It has to do with the death and before you were born and certain books; what people write about, what people paint about, what people think about, pray about, are about. This is what it is. Now I know. It's like I'm in the club.

     But then what? Then what do you do with it? What comes next?"

 

I was just reading and I thought this was a great quote, so I decided to put it in here. Hope you like. It's from "Expecting To Fly" by Martha Tod Dudman. She's from Maine and also Ohio. She and my dad dated. What a small world. Sleep well everyone.

 

I love you Jon

Today I woke up late, thank you God. Then I was in Claudia's film for a little while. Jon and I went to go to Pearl Paint but we went to 579 Mass Ave, Boston instead of 579 Mass Ave, Cambridge. It was annoying beause we were in Roxbury and it was cold. But we ended up going to Utrecht anyways and it probably costed the same. So now I'm gessoing my canvas for Will Barnet's painting: "Dawn". I get to do it tomorrow. 

I think I want to name my dog Cyan. PUPPY! when i get one...

so last night was fun. claud and jon and I went over to sabrinas for a while, that was a great start to the night. sabrina is mad ghetto. haha. then we went over to skeets' and chilled, then we went to Krispy Kreme! mmmmmmmm! and that was pretty late like 2 or something. Then back to sabrinas where we almost watched the whole movie- Requiem For a Dream, but I was really tired and my feet were wet from the snow so I just wanted to go to sleep. So jon and I walked Claudia home in the SNOW and then headed back over here, jon's room, and i slept til like 1. not enough though, i couldn't sleep too well. Elsie called me today, she and Brian might come down to visit. I'm expecting a phone call from Ellie tonight, and hopefully she'll be around Boston, then we can hang out.

So now I'm just waiting for Jon to get out of the shower so that we can go back out in the snow over to my place and I can take a shower. That will be nice :)

My grandfather is in the hospital. My family has been a mess lately kind of, I can't tell if it only seems that way because I'm not around or just because it's a bad season. All I want is for everyone to be alright. I might pray.



I love my family.

I... I came here by day, but I left here in darkness
And found you, found you on the way
And now, it is silver and silent, it is silver and cold
You, in somber resplendence, I hold

Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one
Your sins into me
As a rapturous voice escapes, I will tremble a prayer
And I'll beg for forgiveness
(Your sins into me) Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one

Light, like the flutter of wings, feel your hollow voice rushing into me
As you're longing to sing
So I... I will paint you in silver, I will wrap you in cold
I will lift up your voice as I sink

Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one, now
Your sins into me
As a rapturous voice escapes, I will tremble a prayer
And I'll beg for forgiveness
(Your sins into me) Your sins into me

Cold in life's throws, I'll fall asleep for you
Cold in life's throws, I only ask you turn away
Cold in life's throws, I'll fall asleep for you
Cold in life's throws, I only ask you turn
As they seep... into me, oh, my beautiful one, now

Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one
Your sins into me
As a rapturous voice escapes, I will tremble a prayer
And I'll beg for forgiveness
(Your sins into me)
Your sins into me... oh

Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one, now
Your sins into me
As a rapturous voice escapes, I will tremble a prayer
And I'll beg for forgiveness
(Your sins into me) Your sins into...
(Your sins into me) Your sins into me
Oh, my beautiful one

"Bag lady you gone hurt your back
Dragging all them bags like that
I guess nobody ever told you
All you must hold on to
Is you, is you, is you"



just hold on...

"I'd give anything to feel alive. And I will wait for you tonight."

 

thank you eap

 

hey! your initials backwards are pea! like sweet pea!

How we reach for the arms but only clasp the knees. 

How we reach for each other only to die alone. 

How we reach for the stars only to swim through the dead.

How we strive to connect only to fall apart. 


Just between me and you I felt the rapture in your arms.

I'm in the library looking for a painting to copy for next week. I found a Will Barnet book and I think that's what I'll do. Today was ok, it's cold out. I finished my Tromp Loy (sp) in class which is good. Tonight I have to read and maybe I'll paint a little. Battle for the Ozzfest is on at 10:30 so I might watch that. Hopefully Jon will come over. Well, I think that's all. And I had a question for Sabrina....

If you're planning on transfering than how would you live with Jon and I? Hahah!

Bye.

If I were religious, this would mean even more to me than it already does.

so it's 10:05 on wednesday. President Bush won the election, I didn't get a job, and I'm broke. I don't know what to do with myself! AH! people have grown distant and things aren't going as well as I had hoped. i got all of my homework done which is good i think, but i don't feel good. Jon's watching Pirates of the Carribean in the other room. I've seen it too much so that's why I'm not in there with him. I really just want this weekend to be a good one. I need to take care of myself money wise because I'll be fucked if I don't. I'm writing in pink to see if it helps me get in a better mood. I think it's working. I just gotta think positively. on saturday I'm going to Springfield College with Jon to visit his brother, Will, with Jon and his parents. We're going to go to a football game. I'm excited for that. I register for classes on Friday. I hope I get the ones I want.

 

i think that's all i have to say for now.

 

your skin makes me cry.

It's just that this, this is not the way I'm wired
So could you please,

Help me understand why
You've given in to all these
Reckless dark desires

You're lying to yourself again
Suicidal imbecile
Think about it, put it on the faultline
What'll it take to get it through to you precious
Over this. Why do you wanna throw it away like this
Such a mess. I don't want to watch you.

Disconnect and self destruct one bullet at a time
What's your rush now, everyone will have his day to die

Medicated, drama queen, picture perfect, numb belligerence
Narcissistic, drama queen, craving fame and all its decadence

Disconnect and self destruct one bullet at a time

They were right about you

Lying to my face again
Suicidal imbecile
Think about it put it on the fautline

Over this, why do you wanna throw it away like this
Such a mess, Coalesce, Coalesce

If you choose to pull the trigger, should your drama prove sincere,
Do it somewhere far away from here

it's all happening...

I watched Almost Famous last night with Tim and Melissa and Claudia and Katie and Jon and me. Alex went home for the weekend. I'm at Jon's and he's getting ready so that I can go get ready for Ellie's grandfather's show today in Beverly, Mass. which should be fun. I think the RedSox game is tonight, and we're all going to hang out with Sabrina tonight I believe. And I get to see my parents today! I'm a little out of it but I feel alright. Call me on my cell if anyone wants to chill.

hahahahhahahahahhahahahahahhahahahhahha

I slept in today, that was very nice. so i didn't go to class which is nice also but i've also been procrastinating today really bad. i watched two episodes of buffy and ate and drank a lot. i guess that's supposed to be good for you when you're sick, but it never really feels good when you know that there's work that you have to do.

i feel dead though. i just left the room for the first time after i took a shower and such, and i went down to put my laundry in and now i feel like i just hiked katahdin. and! i took the elevator!!!! jesus i'm out of it.

i hope that everyone is having a great day. my plans for the weekend are as follows: paint a lot, hang out at sabrinas at some point, and become unsick. yay. i'm thinking of writing letters to people because i never get any mail so maybe i have to start it. well yea. i'm off to procrastinate some more. i love you jon.

GO SOX!

im sick. its nasty outside too. and my back really hurts. i'm getting frustrated with some of the teachers at school because they don't really get back to me when i need them to. kind of reminds me of waynflete. the used is playing in worshester in november with the bled and two other bands. i can't wait. 

i need to go to bed early tonight!


i love you jon  :)

I added two new friends! How exciting...
I just got out of Painting, and it's really hot in our room! Red Sox play in an hour, i have to do crazy English homework, and I'm exhausted. That's my story............



ummmmmmmmm that's it i think. 

tootles

So i went home this weekend. It was awesome to see my family and elsie and brian. I came back yesterday with my parents and Jon and we went to Brookline and had Vietnamese food for lunch, it was really delish. Now I'm just working on mypaper that's due tomorrow, even though we don't have class! It's for my Art History class that's about pre-hispanic america, and the class was cancelled because of Columbus Day! hahahaha, i thought that was pretty funny. yea, so my job situation sucks and i'm gonna go into fin.aid office tomorrow and talk to them to see if I can get stuff figured out. I NEED MONEY SO BAD! but for now i'm good i think, i need to take a shower soon. i'm gonna go finish the paragraph i'm on now and then probably take a shower. 

jon- i love you like claudia loves hats

Free from the torment of sin
All this I'm giving up
Much as the sun would decide to give in
Explode into orange
And hear all the voices sing praise with hymns
Mark the birth of a change
Free from the torment of sin
All this I'm giving up

It's not me
Buried wreckage my soul
It's not me so who am I now

Over and over again
Light with a sharpened edge 
Cut through the black empty space we call sky
Beginning the cycle that stays
And I know in my heart we all die
Like the day and the night
Like the sun in the sky
All this I'm giving up

It's not me
Buried wreckage my soul
It's not me so who am I now?

Is there another side?
Beyond the black and the white
Place I could meet you by
A place on the other side
I'll let you know when I go
When I'm gone

It's not me 
Buried wreckage my soul
It's not me so who am I now?

hi 
i'm about to go to bookmaking and then afterwards heading over to the museum with amelia. tonight we're celebrating katie's 18th birthday by going out to dinner somewhere fun. i can't really afford it but i guess i'll have to get something. tomorrow's friday and i'm coming home to maine around 2 or 3. I'm really excited to see my family and Kath's new apartment and hang out with Mosh. 


Ellie: I don't know if you're coming with us tomorrow, will you let me know? Jon might get the tickets early.

i'm waiting for my laundry to be ready to dry. my mom said she can't pick us up on friday, she's going to drive us back though, so either jon's mom (if she can) will pick us up or we can take the bus. alex and claudia went to chinatown, which i decided not to because i have homework, and i'm not doing it. i'm having a wierd day. i'm really excited to go home, i miss maine. 

i catch myself getting sad and i don't really like it. i have't cried for a long time though. i liked all the stimulation at first but now it's all becoming normal and the change is quite difficult. oh well. 

peace

It's sunday night and I'm alone. Katie isn't back yet from Maine and Alex and Claudia went to play volleyball at Emanuel. I've been trying to read but it's difficult. This weekend was fun: Friday we dyed our hair! and hung out at Skeets' house. Saturday we went to the museum and saw 'Dragonflies, the baby cries' and 'Nosferatu' which were both pretty sweet. And I met Sabrina who's really nice, she's in Claud's film class. We went to Prudential and Copley and dreamed about being rich. Then Jon and Claud and I came back and watched 'Jay and Silent Bob Stike Back' until 4:00 (bad idea). But I have to say that the best part of the whole weekend was that I got to sleep in my bed with Jon both nights! Even though it was a little small. I can feel Fall. Ellie - I downloaded In Love and Death if you want to copy it sometime, but only if you copy blink for me. It's cold in here. So I guess that's all I've got to say. Back to school tomorrow. Oil Painting all day. Hope everyone is great. 

Cheers

we drove these streets heads to shoulders
existing to tell the tales of letting go
and now we're strangled to tears on the fallback farewell 
its all in our heads 
the faint whispers
i tried to tell myself when its already over
that the reasons found decoys
and this is holding me back
as if to say what you thought you heard
i wish i did
i don't want to feel this pull as this city becomes home without you

so i've got a story for you....

i was in my drawing class today and our teacher decided to invite a performing art class into our class so that we could document their performances through drawing. so there were about ten people in the performance all doing their own things all at the same time. Some of them were tying string everywhere, some were making coffee and putting paper in their cup, some were doing the hoola-hoop, and one guy was walking around like an old homeless man with a cup of coffee and a bagel. he started pouring coffee onto peoples paper and smudging the bagel on the paper, it was really retarded but we all got over it after a few minutes just because performance art is so "special" (psht). anyways, after a while of all this stuff going on and the smell of coffee slowly becoming grosser and grosser the old homeless guy put another table on top of the one i was sitting at (they're little drawing tables) and started looking at his coffee and like lining it up and measuring it with his hands and eyes. i was trying to sharpen my charcoal when suddenly i heard a smash and there was coffee allllllllllllllllllllllll over me. my hair was soaking, my shirt was drenched and it was in my ear and on my face on my right side. i was completely speachless and just left because i wasn't about to "interfere with the art" but i was so fucking mad!!!!!!!!! ahhh!!!!!!! and then i couldn't just leave so i stayed all dried up coffee like for the rest of the class and when the guy was finally out of his character he was like "did i hurt you?" i said " no but i got soaking wet" and he was like "oh, i don't really care, just as long as i didn't hurt you" AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! snarl.







hope everyone had a better day then me!

this is where i got my picture (up there^( yay suza!)


http://www.piratestripes.net/scalora/extras.html
since no one likes to write me letters or e-mails...except jon:), leave me a comment or something! i miss everyone and it's sad! love love love...

i went to the Metric show last night with Claudia, Alex, John, and Jon and it was awesome. I had such a great time, and I got their set list! And John ripped these stickers out of the guitartist's jacket!!!! yay! 

but we didn't get to bed until late so that was kinda bad. I woke up and after i got out of the shower, katie yelled "hey guys? does anyone know where the fire extiguisher is?" and alex like ran in. the microwave was on fire because katie didn't know you can't put metal in the microwave and she was heating up tea so the tea bag caught fire. alex put it out with the extinguisher and there was that green dust shit everywhere. but we were already all late for class so we had to leave. but we cleaned up after.

i have to go back to painting class in a little bit. I started a still life oil painting. it's fun actually! i'm so tired though......



i love you jon!


i'm coming home for columbus day weekend! yay!

The streets were wet
and the gate was locked so I jumped it,
and I let you in.
And you stood at your door with your hands on my waist
and you kissed me like you meant it.
And I knew that you meant it,
that you meant it,
that you meant it,
and I knew,
that you meant it,
that you meant it.

hi...
ellie, will you copy the newest blink cd? i really want it! i know it sounds dorky, "uhh she listens to blink 182, pshhht!" but i just want it ok! dont make fun of me!

i'm out of class for the weekend, it's so exciting. alright well i'm gonna go lie down while i wait for jon to call me and then we'll go downtown to shop! (for certain people who's birthdays are soon :) hehehheheheh) pce.

jon just left a little while ago and i'm sad. 

i'm sick and i want to go to bed but something's keeping me. argh.
tomorrow's friday so that's exciting, i can't wait to sleep late on saturday! 
goodnight everyone,
i love you jon!

like a shadow on the edge of my peripheral sight.













emotklat

yesterday my teacher in "drawing breath" told us to listen to things and draw the sounds. it was really fun actually, at first i thought i was going to kill myself with my charcoal but i didn't! yay.

he said "I don't need a sea shell to hear the ocean"


kath called and woke me up this morning, thank god because it was 8:30 and I needed to get in the shower anyways. it's really windy in boston today. its refreshing! but i miss maine, i didn't think i would really, but its noisy here. and there aren't any trees. but i'm starting to meet more and more people so that's always good. my school rules. 

and i get to see jon :) 
i love you so much, come lift me onto my bed! squishy:)
bye
so i decided to make my life even more complicated than it is and made a livejournal! ya like? I'm exhausted so I'll start the fun tomorrow ;)
